languages.text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.
languages.original_text: Если в {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} попала {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g}, совершенная союзником, то первое такое попадание в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} не наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Если это атака {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, то условие выполняется для всех попаданий в рамках одной очереди.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally hits the Vanguard for the first time in a round, that attack deals no damage to the Vanguard. If this attack is a burst attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

Whenever an attack made by an ally hits the Vanguard for the first time in a round, that attack deals no damage to the Vanguard. If this attack is a burst attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

languages.text: Если в {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} попала {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g}, совершенная союзником, то первое такое попадание в {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} не наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Если это атака {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, то условие выполняется для всех попаданий в рамках одной очереди.
languages.original_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

traits.locale_text: Если в авангарда попала атака, совершенная союзником, то первое такое попадание в раунде не наносит урон. Если это выстрел очередью, то условие выполняется для всех попаданий в рамках одной очереди.
Если в авангарда попала атака, совершенная союзником, то первое такое попадание в раунде не наносит урон. Если это выстрел очередью, то условие выполняется для всех попаданий в рамках одной очереди.

languages.text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当盟友的攻击首次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}时，此次攻击不会对先锋造成任何{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果此次攻击为{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击，则所有攻击命中先锋时，都不会造成任何伤害。
languages.original_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

traits.locale_text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当盟友的攻击首次{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}先锋时，此次攻击不会对先锋造成任何伤害。如果此次攻击为{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发射击{/g}，则此次连发射击每次命中先锋时都不会造成伤害。

languages.text: Cada vez que un ataque efectuado por un aliado {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, ese ataque no inflige ningún {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al vanguardia. Si el ataque es un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}, esto se aplica a todos los impactos de la ráfaga.
languages.original_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un ataque efectuado por un aliado {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacte{/g} al vanguardia por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, ese ataque no inflige ningún daño al vanguardia. Si el ataque es un {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ataque de ráfaga{/g}, esto se aplica a todos los impactos de la ráfaga que se realicen con éxito.

languages.text: Durch den ersten {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} eines Verbündeten in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erleidet die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} keinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Ist dieser Angriff ein {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salven{/g}angriff, gilt dies für jeden Treffer der Salve.
languages.original_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

traits.locale_text: Durch den ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} eines Verbündeten in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} wird die Vorhut nicht geschädigt. Sollte es sich bei diesem Angriff um einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Bündelangriff{/g} handeln, gilt dies für jeden aufeinanderfolgenden Bündeltreffer.

languages.text: Lorsqu'une attaque lancée par un allié {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, elle ne lui inflige pas de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. S'il s'agit d'une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}, cela s'applique à tous les coups portés par ladite rafale.
languages.original_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une attaque menée par un allié {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} le Patrouilleur pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, cette attaque n'inflige aucun dégât au Patrouilleur. S'il s'agit d'une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}attaque en rafale{/g}, cela s'applique à tous les coups réussis de la rafale.

languages.text: その{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中はじめて、味方の攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した時、その攻撃でヴァンガードへ与えられる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}はゼロになる。この攻撃がバースト攻撃である場合、この効果は{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃それぞれに適用される。
languages.original_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.

traits.locale_text: その{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中はじめて、ヴァンガードが味方の攻撃に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した時、その攻撃でヴァンガードへ与えられるダメージはゼロになる。この攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}バースト攻撃{/g}である場合、この効果はバーストの攻撃それぞれに適用される。

languages.text: Bir dost birim tarafından yapılan bir saldırı, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde ilk kez {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü'yü{/g} vurduğunda o saldırı Öncü'ye hiç {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} vermez. Saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırıysa{/g} bu kural, seri saldırının her başarılı vuruşuna uygulanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever an attack made by an ally {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that attack deals no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Vanguard. If this attack is a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack, this applies to each successful hit in the burst.
